Class Summary
CDKPopupMenu Basically, identical to the JPopupMenu class, except that this menu can also contain the source for which it was popped up.
Controller2DHub Class that will central interaction point between a mouse event throwing widget (SWT or Swing) and the Controller2D modules.
Controller2DModel  
Controller2DModuleAddAtom Adds an atom on the given location on mouseclick
Controller2DModuleChangeFormalC Changes (Increases or Decreases) Formal Charge of an atom
Controller2DModuleHighlight This should highlight the atom/bond when moving over with the mouse
Controller2DModuleMove Demo IController2DModule.
Controller2DModuleRemove deletes closest atom on click
ExampleController2DModule Demo IController2DModule.
SwingEventRelay  
SwingMouseEventRelay  
UndoAdapter An undo adapter for updating the state of the undo components according to the new state of the undo history list.
